page.title: 14NAIRN:TRADESPARK ESTATE
page.content: Tradespark is a{housing}estate.There are all types of houses ranging from little cottages to four bedroomed houses.There is a Spar shop and a little church on the corner of Blairfield Road and on the other corner there is a{convalescent home. The home caters for people over 40 years old after an operation,or if they want a break from their own home. Many of the people who stay here have lost there husbands or wives. There are seven play areas for children.Most of them have the usual swings and climbing frames. There are two main housing areas. These are: Robbins Court and Cullen Court.The houses range from fifty years ago up until this decade.There has just been a new council housing scheme built in Moss_side Road.
